title: Unable to load client, Patcher error

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body:
Hey guys, 

Just wondering if I could get an answer on an easy fix rather than downloading whole client if possible.

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey Callummatt,
Sorry to see you having this issue.

I have a few friends that have experienced this issue and once of the solutions they tried to fix the issue is below.
I need to be clear, I have never tried this myself.

Make sure league is completely closed.
Go ahead to your LoL directory. In my case [ C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system ] and search for ''system.cfg''
Open it with notepad, copy everything out to a new text document for safe keeping. Now delete everything on it (if there's anything) and paste this content.
DownloadPath = /releases/live
DownloadURL = l3cdn.riotgames.com
Region = OC1

Save the file and reopen league.
If everything worked correctly it should do an update and fix your error. If not then head over to this page
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/I8XUgB8w-rads-error-or-unable-to-connect-to-supportriotgamescom 
and try the solutions in there.
Otherwise unfortunately I believe you will need to uninstall and re install.

-ToxicHawk

I've tried the system.cfg the only difference is that it is presented as
 
DownloadURL = l3cdn.riotgames.com
DownloadPath= /releases/live
Region = OC1

Also tried the solutions on that page none of which worked

Tried an uninstall reinstall and it freezes at 86% (1mb/s to 0) and around 260mb left to patch which I may be wrong but is probably size of the patch ? Could this be a patch specific issue ?

Edit 2nd attempt: http://gyazo.com/8c35f4bef60f07b8f0b057f8863dc5a3
Edit: from 79%-91% it remains at 269mb with 0 download speed this appears to just be a bug in downloading and its installing updates, problem solved
